alert.note: Alert for Liberty; Long; McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 20 at 4:29PM EDT until October 20 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF LIBERTY...MCINTOSH AND LONG COUNTIES... At 428 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over McIntosh, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Hinesville, Fort Stewart, Jones, McIntosh, Walthourville, Midway, Riceboro, Flemington, Allenhurst, Gumbranch, and Gum Branch. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
